actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to exempt certain public school teachers and other public school employees who work full-time on academic schedules of less than a full year from reductions in benefits by reason of State or local government pension benefits based on such service.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) to exempt public school teachers and other public school employees who are employed for a full school year, but have not less than 60 consecutive days of uncompensated leave per year, from reductions in benefits by reason of State or local pension benefits based on such service.

titles.title: To amend title II of the Social Security Act to exempt certain public school teachers and other public school employees who work full-time on academic schedules of less than a full year from reductions in benefits by reason of State or local government pension benefits based on such service.
